comments.body: This breaks Apache Livy, as @HyukjinKwon pointed out. https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/20944#issuecomment-436530497
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -192,6 +192,7 @@ private[hive] class IsolatedClientLoader(
     (name.startsWith("com.google") && !name.startsWith("com.google.cloud")) ||
     name.startsWith("java.lang.") ||
     name.startsWith("java.net") ||
+    name.startsWith("org.apache.derby.") ||
